anyOf.description: Create alternative name for a collection. Collection will be available under both names for search, retrieve,
Delete alias if exists
Change alias to a new one

CollectionInfo.description: Current statistics and configuration of the collection.

Distance.description: Type of internal tags, build from payload Distance function types used to compare vectors

geo_bounding_box.description: Check if points geo location lies in a given area

geo_radius.description: Check if geo point is within a given radius

match.description: Check if point has field with a given value

range.description: Check if points value lies in a given range

anyOf.description: Create index for payload field
Delete index for the field

should.description: At least one of thous conditions should match

radius.description: Radius of the area in meters

anyOf.description: Do not use any index, scan whole vector collection during search. Guarantee 100% precision, but may be time consuming on large collections.
Use filterable HNSW index for approximate search. Is very fast even on a very huge collections, but require additional space to store index and additional time to build it.

ef_construct.description: Number of neighbours to consider during the index building. Larger the value - more accurate the search, more time required to build index.

m.description: Number of edges per node in the index graph. Larger the value - more accurate the search, more space required.

anyOf.description: Do not index anything, just keep of what should be indexed later
Build payload index. Index is saved on disc, but index itself is in RAM

PayloadOps.description: Define operations description for point payloads manipulation

anyOf.description: Set payload value, overrides if it is already exists

points.description: Assigns payload to each point in this list

anyOf.description: Deletes specified payload values if they are assigned

points.description: Deletes values from each point in this list

anyOf.description: Drops all Payload values associated with given points.
Inset points from a batch.
Insert points from a list
Insert or update points
Delete point if exists

filter.description: Look only for points which satisfies this conditions

negative.description: Try to avoid vectors like this

positive.description: Look for vectors closest to those

top.description: Max number of result to return

payload.description: Payload - values assigned to the point

score.description: Points vector distance to the query vector

anyOf.description: Params relevant to HNSW index

ef.description: Size of the beam in a beam-search. Larger the value - more accurate the result, more time required for search.

filter.description: Look only for points which satisfies this conditions

top.description: Max number of result to return

vector.description: Look for vectors closest to this

anyOf.description: Create new collection and (optionally) specify index params
Delete collection with given name
Perform changes of collection aliases. Alias changes are atomic, meaning that no collection modifications can happen between alias operations.
Store vectors in memory and use persistence storage only if vectors are changed
Use memmap to store vectors, a little slower than `InMemory`, but requires little RAM
